The Toolbox Package

The Toolbox package routines provide basic support for the remainder of the SAMRAI framework. This support is divided into these categories:

  1. basic utilities
  2. memory management
  3. MPI and communication schedules
  4. message and file streams
  5. database interface and object serialization
  6. input file processing
  7. restart file management
  8. timer and statistics utilities

All class names in the Toolbox package are in the SAMRAI::tbox namespace.

Generated on 8 Oct 2014 for SAMRAI by  1.6.1
